params.lpTokens: Amount of LP tokens to burn.

returns.rewards: Available rewards that can be harvested.
Total rewards harvested and converted to base asset.

params.minLpOut: Minimum LP tokens expected to prevent slippage.

returns.lpTokensReceived: Actual LP tokens received from the pool join.

returns.rate: The current stS/S exchange rate (scaled by 1e18).

params.gauge: The gauge contract address for the pool.
params.lpTokens: Amount of LP tokens to stake.
Amount of LP tokens to unstake.

exitPool(address,uint256,address,address.notice: Remove liquidity from a BEETS pool by burning LP tokens

getPendingRewards(address,address).notice: Check how many rewards an account can claim

getPoolApr(address).notice: Get the total yield percentage for a pool (base yield + rewards)

getPoolGauge(address).notice: Get the gauge contract for a pool

getPoolLpToken(address).notice: Get the LP token contract for a pool

getStakedBalance(address,address).notice: Check how many LP tokens an account has staked

harvestRewards(address).notice: Collect rewards from the gauge and convert them to base asset

joinPool(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Add liquidity to a BEETS pool with two tokens. Make sure to approve the adapter to spend your tokens first

stSRate().notice: Get how much S one stS is worth

stakeInGauge(address,uint256).notice: Stake LP tokens in the gauge to earn extra rewards

unstakeFromGauge(address,uint256).notice: Remove LP tokens from the gauge
